titles.title: A bill to include dehydroepiandrosterone as an anabolic steroid.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2629-2630)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
3/5/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Controlled Substances Act to include dehydroepiandrosterone (DHEA) within the definition of "anabolic steroid."
